column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Felicia - Thank you for the 5-star review. We greatly appreciate your extremely high praise. We are most happy
column3: that we can count you as one of our "JINYA Regulars." I'm glad we are able to provide a consistent bowl of ramen / chashu bowl
column4: as well as consistent service. On behalf of our front and back of house
column5: I thank you and look forward to your next visit.
